HediffDef.label: jackal legs
HediffDef.description: Transformed Jackal legs that have developed powerful muscles and a spring-like structure. These modifications grant the ability to perform extraordinary jumps, enhancing both mobility and combat capabilities. The altered leg structure also increases overall movement speed.

HediffDef.label: chitinous legs
HediffDef.description: A disturbing transformation where the legs have morphed into insect-like appendages. The skin has hardened into a chitinous exoskeleton, and the feet have split into multiple clawed digits. Despite their unnerving appearance, these legs grant exceptional speed and agility. They also increase caravan speed.
